welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Annapolis, the charming capital city of Maryland! Known for its rich history, picturesque streets, and beautiful waterfront, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lee Airport handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport, providing check-in, baggage claim, and gate services for all flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport, handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
